title: 98/154/EC: Commission Decision of 10 February 1998 approving the monitoring plan for the detection of residues or substances in live animals and animal products presented by Finland (Only the Finnish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 February 1998 approving the monitoring plan for the detection of residues or substances in live animals and animal products presented by Finland (Only the Finnish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/154/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The monitoring plan for the detection of the residues and substances referred to in Annex I to Directive 96/23/EC in live animals and animal products presented by Finland is hereby approved.
Finland shall adopt the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to implement the plan referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Finland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 125, 23. 5. 1996, p. 10.
